name: Minigolf Adventure
overview: Minigolf Adventure delivers incredible visuals and a lot of gameplay time. Put the ball into the hole but be careful because danger lurks at every turn! It’s the ultimate experience for everyone that wants an exciting, fun, and rewarding casual game. With Minigolf Adventure, you can train, play against friends or just enjoy your time. Become the ultimate mini-golf player today! Features: - 5 game modes - Handcrafted levels with stunning graphics - Incredible attention to detail - Various balls to choose from - 100+ unique levels - 3 environments with varied physics
